sentences.en: All patients underwent an elective osseous surgical procedure on the forefoot.
sentences.cn: 所有病人都作了前足的选择性骨手术.

sentences.en: Besides the required courses, I'm taking an elective in computer.
sentences.cn: 除了必修课外, 我正在选修电脑课.

sentences.en: Buchanan has never held elective office.
sentences.cn: 布坎南从未就任过经选举产生的职位。

sentences.en: Closed suction drainage is not warranted in elective total joint replacement.
sentences.cn: 择期全关节置换术后无必要常规施行闭合吸引引流.

sentences.en: Elective surgery afterward . The patient remained well one year after surgery.
sentences.cn: 病人成功的接受选择性的手术治疗,术后一年追踪情况良好.

sentences.en: He took Private International Law as an elective course this semester.
sentences.cn: 这个学期,他选修了国际私法的课程.

sentences.en: I decided to take a dramatic arts class as my elective.
sentences.cn: 我决定选择戏剧艺术课程作为我的选修课.

sentences.en: In elective courses, subjects are made for the students.
sentences.cn: 在选修课程中, 设计一些专题供学生选修.

sentences.en: Most of the students of our class take Japanese as an elective course.
sentences.cn: 我们班大部分同学选修日语.

sentences.en: Senior English Elective 6,5 units of text translation and - school answer!
sentences.cn: 高中英语选修6,5个单元的课文翻译以及课后答案!

sentences.en: Table tennis sophomore elective, it is not about a physical movement.
sentences.cn: 大二选修乒乓球, 又是一门不讲究体能的运动.

sentences.en: the 34 elective seats in the National Assembly
sentences.cn: 国民议会中的34个选举席位

sentences.en: The choice of elective subjects is left entirely to the students.
sentences.cn: 对于选修课程的选择权完全交给了学生.

sentences.en: The content of curriculum includes: Basic course, core course and elective course.
sentences.cn: 本所之课程内容包含: 基础课程 、 核心课程以及选修课程.

sentences.en: This course is an elective course for undergraduates who major in Chinese.
sentences.cn: 本课程为汉语言专业本科生的选修课.

words.tran_cn: 被选的人；特殊阶层；上帝的选民
选举；当选；选择权；上帝的选拔
从事选举活动；积极竞选的人
选举人；有选举权的人；总统选举人
从事选举活动；积极参加竞选

phrases.tran_cn: 选择性外科手术；非急需施行的手术

trans.tran_cn: 由选举产生的，有选举权的，选修的，〈医〉非急需的
trans.tran_en: an elective position or organization is one for which there is an election
a course that students can choose to take, but they do not have to take it in order to graduate
